abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The nilbog's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: mage hand, Tasha's hideous laughter, vicious mockery 1/day: confusion

abilities.name: Nilbogism.
abilities.description: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

abilities.name: Nimble Escape.
abilities.description: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
